page.title: 09LIVING IN JERSEY
page.content: We like living in Jersey and think that it must be better than living in England. The island is not as crowded as the cities, and there is not as much crime here. There are so many beaches to go to and the sea is nice and clear, and there are places to visit such as the sand dunes or the commons. Our parents like living here because they only pay twenty pence in the pound tax, and they think that Jersey is a good place to bring children up in. We asked some visitors why they had chosen to have their holiday here. They all said that they were hoping for lots of sunshine and intended to spend most of their time relaxing. They were also happy that there were places to visit if the weather was not so good.
